original_text: They answered, ‘An Egyptian man saved us from the shepherds. He even took water from the well and he gave it to our animals.’
korean_text: 그들이 이르되 한 애굽 사람이 우리를 목자들의 손에서 건져내고 우리를 위하여 물을 길어 양 떼에게 먹였나이다

sentences.original_text: 'An Egyptian man saved us from the shepherds
sentences.korean_translation: 한 이집트 사람이 우리를 목자들로부터 구원했다

sentences.original_text: He even took water from the well
and he gave it to our animals.'
